nodes.about: We are a computational group working in the broad area of chemical and materials sciences. An overarching theme of our group is to leverage artificial intelligence, high-performance computing, and atomistic molecular simulations to understand and design new materials for renewable energy and healthcare applications. We develop state-of-the-art machine learning models, cutting-edge automation workflows, and advanced reliability analysis frameworks, and apply them to areas like structure-property prediction and chemical reaction mechanism identification.
